TABLE.NAME: quiz_archiver_jobs
TABLE.COMMENT: Job status table for quiz archiver jobs

FIELD.NAME: jobid
FIELD.COMMENT: UUID of the job. Assigned by the archive worker.

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this job is associated with

FIELD.NAME: cmid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course module this job is associated with

FIELD.NAME: quizid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the quiz this job is associated with

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the user that initiated this job

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: Status of this job

FIELD.NAME: statusextras
FIELD.COMMENT: JSON containing additional information for the current job status

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Time this job was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Time this job was updated

FIELD.NAME: retentiontime
FIELD.COMMENT: The unix timestamp until when this archive has to be retained. It can be deleted automatically afterwards.

FIELD.NAME: wstoken
FIELD.COMMENT: Webservice token that is allowed to write this job via the Moodle API

FIELD.NAME: artifactfileid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the artifact file from {files}, if present in Moodle storage

FIELD.NAME: artifactfilechecksum
FIELD.COMMENT: Content hash of the artifact file, if present in Moodle storage

TABLE.NAME: quiz_archiver_files
TABLE.COMMENT: Assigns temporary Moodle files to quiz archiver jobs

FIELD.NAME: jobid
FIELD.COMMENT: Internal ID of the job inside quiz_archiver_jobs table

FIELD.NAME: pathnamehash
FIELD.COMMENT: Pathnamehash (SHA1) of the file that is associated with the job

TABLE.NAME: quiz_archiver_job_settings
TABLE.COMMENT: Logs archive settings during job creation

FIELD.NAME: jobid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the associated job inside the quiz_archiver_jobs table

FIELD.NAME: jobid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the associated job inside the quiz_archiver_jobs table

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Time this TSP data was stored

FIELD.NAME: server
FIELD.COMMENT: URL of the RFC 3161 TSP server used for this request

FIELD.NAME: timestampquery
FIELD.COMMENT: DER encoded binary TSP query

FIELD.NAME: timestampreply
FIELD.COMMENT: DER encoded binary TSP reply

TABLE.NAME: quiz_archiver_attempts
TABLE.COMMENT: Keeps track of attempts and respective users that are contained within a quiz archive

FIELD.NAME: jobid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the associated job inside the quiz_archiver_jobs table

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the user that made the referenced quiz attempt

FIELD.NAME: attemptid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the attempt that is contained inside the referenced archive
